name: Mezzanine
description: Mezzanine is an early stage property investment platform which aims to transform the way first-time buyers get on the property ladder, in a financially beneficial and hugely scalable way. We are addressing one of the most widespread socio-economic issues in the UK today – Generation Rent – with an innovative adaptation of the traditional property finance model based around a deposit-boosting shadow-equity loan, provided through a highly profitable fund management structure.

jobs.title: Co founder / business partner
jobs.descriptionHtml:
A hands-on, board level role covering all aspects of shaping and developing the business, working directly with the founder. Given the breadth of operations the role will cover, no specific background is sought, however the right candidate is likely to have the following:

Operational experience at a senior level in the mortgage industry with a proven record of streamlining operations, developing new lending products and driving growth;

or

Hands-on experience bringing new consumer finance products or services to market or driving growth of a fin-tech, prop-tech or P2P business;

or

Experience in establishing and running a successful alternative investment fund or property investment fund.
